As his second in command approached, Tyrael walked to meet him up.

Tyrael: We need to find out if we are at the right place. This means 
that if the scans I asked are positive, we will raid one of the base. 
Our objective here is not to eradicate our enemy, only to pinpoint 
their position, if they are truly here. However, if I am right, there 
should be two bases. We will divide our group and raid both bases at 
the same time.

----------------------------------

At the same time, inside the base, the stasis pod was scanning through 
the ship's computer for a beast mode. After only a few nano-cycles, it 
had found one.

Pod computer: DNA sequencing initialized. Merging with protoform. 
Techno-organic technology detected. (and after a few moments...) 
Protoform merged. Welcome, new tri...

The door of the pod flew in the air along with most of the 
electronics. Tendrils protruded form there, always going higher and 
higher. A cruel laugh emerged from the pod, but it was a quiet kind of 
laugh, not a loud one. The kind that the truly mad ones make. The low 
voice only enhanced the effect.

???????: Hehehe... I feel like slagging someone for my birthday! Let's 
just see where the new major took the whole bunch of us. (He opened a 
general Tripredacus frequency) I'm Burrock. Requesting orders and 
permission to slag.

Tyrael was not caught by surprise, he was even pleased at the first 
words of the bot. He responded.

Tyrael: I am Major Tyrael. Join me at the base's entrance. As for the 
other request... This will come soon enough.

Burrock: You won't be disappointed, man. Beast mode!

Then, a large worm came out of the pod and started moving, quite fast 
for his beast mode. Covered with a circuited skin, he easily found his 
way around. Th weird one thought of all the massacres he would have 
the joy to cause and smile inside.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Shadow Star took a lizard mode, then activated a
> stasis pod and went to see Tyreal.
> 
> --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Tyrael thought for a moment. Of course, establishing
> > a perimeter was a 
> > priority, but making certain that they were at the
> > right place was 
> > more important.
> > 
> > Tyrael: Cancel your present orders. We have to know
> > where we are 
> > first. Shadow Star, activate a stasis pod as soon as
> > you have taken a 
> > beast mode. Once you are done, come and see me. Naga
> > and Talon, check 
> > the long range scanners for any thermal sources
> > other than geological. 
> > Try to see if you detect any energy signatures.
> > 
> > OOC: I'll take the new bot, and anyone else who is
> > interested by a 
> > new char, just let me know.
> > 
> > 
> 
>
